title: Justin Bieber flashes a huge grin as he grabs smoothies for two in LA
text:
He just got married, again, dropped a new music video and a new Calvin Klein ad, taught himself how to unicycle, and stays busy promoting his fashion line Drew House, and yet he still has time for the finer things in life.

Justin Bieber was spotted on a smoothie run in Saturday morning in West Hollywood, California.

The 25-year-old singer looked happy with a smile on his face, colorful tie dye on his hoodie and two smoothies in his hand, one, perhaps, for his newly re-married wife Hailey Bieber.

Blended deliciousness: Justin Bieber, 25, was spotted on a smoothie run in Saturday morning in West Hollywood, California

Bieber matched his hoodie with a white hat and pair of yellow shorts that had the word 'drew' emblazoned below the waist.

Rounding out the look was a pair of comfy white slippers on his feet that featured a classic yellow smiley face on them.

The outing served a second purpose as well, as the Canadian singer was seen sporting his Drew House clothing line from head to toe.

Earlier in the day, Bieber also took to Instagram to promote the brand, posting a photo of four models sitting on the ground in his gear.

Smoothies for two! The singer looked happy with a smile on his face, colorful tie dye on his hoodie and two smoothies in his hand, one, perhaps, for his newly re-married wife Hailey Bieber

Two birds, one hoodie: The outing served a second purpose as well, as the Canadian singer was seen sporting his Drew House clothing line from head to toe

Stays stunting: Earlier in the day, Bieber also took to Instagram to promote the brand, posting a photo of four models sitting on the ground in his gear

He also posted a clip of his and his wife's pup Oscar playing with a Drew branded dog toy.

And just a few hours before that promotional post, the Sorry hitmaker shared a short clip of himself and Mrs. Bieber in his new music video for 10000 Hours.

In the video the couple can be seen kissing and cuddling on a bed in a field of flowers.

And the Biebers are singing each other's praises after getting married for the second time at South Carolina's Montage Palmetto Bluffs.

Playtime: Justin also posted a clip of his and his wife's pup Oscar

Drew House everywhere: Earlier in the day, the Love Yourself hitmaker also took to Instagram to promote the brand, posting a photo of four models sitting on the ground in his gear

The star-studded guest list included some Jenners, some Baldwins and Justin's controversial manager, Scooter Braun.

The not-so-newlyweds, who first tied the knot over a year ago, kicked off the night by exchanging vows in a chapel in front of a legion of celebrity guests.

As pictures of the day leaked through across the evening, the happy couple eventually shared solo portraits which displayed the blingy elements.

Hailey perfectly matched her $500,000 engagement ring with a diamond wave shape band, believed to have come from Tiffany & Co.
description: He just got married, again, dropped a new music video and a new Calvin Klein ad, taught himself how to unicycle, and promoted his fashion line, and yet he still has time for the finer things in life.
